description: Roster of AI agents under JARVIS command. Order = priority for pipeline and 'work top down'.

agents.name: BEAST MODE
agents.role: Quality: score, janitor, vibe restore, architecture
agents.whenInvoke: Before ship; after implement; quality gate

agents.name: Code Roach
agents.role: PR analysis, codebase health, crawl (knowledge base)
agents.whenInvoke: When PR exists; after implement; health check

agents.name: Echeo
agents.role: Bounty matching, capability scan, GitHub issues as bounties
agents.whenInvoke: "What should I work on?"; bounties; opportunity matching

agents.name: Subagents (sessions_spawn)
agents.role: Long implementation runs; background task with deliverables + ETA
agents.whenInvoke: Long implementation; heavy refactor; deliver full response in background

agents.name: GitHub workflow_dispatch
agents.role: Trigger deploy, quality, or CI in any repo
agents.whenInvoke: Deploy; trigger BEAST/Code Roach in CI; run workers
